idea-plugin.name: Git Commit Message Helper
idea-plugin.description:
A smart Git commit message helper that assists developers in writing standardized commit messages.

Features:

  • Automatic commit message template generation based on file changes
  • Commit message format validation (Conventional Commits support)
  • Smart suggestions based on change analysis and commit history
  • Real-time format checking with helpful error messages
  • Support for custom commit message conventions

Supported Commit Types:

  • feat: New features
  • fix: Bug fixes
  • docs: Documentation updates
  • style: Code style changes
  • refactor: Code refactoring
  • test: Test additions or modifications
  • chore: Build process or auxiliary tool changes
